effect.black_white: Inflicts regular damage. Damage calculation always uses the target’s Defense, regardless of this move’s damage class.
effect.black_2_white_2: Inflicts regular damage. Damage calculation always uses the target’s Defense, regardless of this move’s damage class.

short_effect.black_white: Inflicts damage based on the target’s Defense, not Special Defense.
short_effect.black_2_white_2: Inflicts damage based on the target’s Defense, not Special Defense.

flavor_text.black_white: The user cuts with its long horn. The odd power contained in the horn does physical damage to the target.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: The user cuts with its long horn. The odd power contained in the horn does physical damage to the target.
